{"step_by_step_thinking": "Thumb sucking is a common habit among babies and young children. It's a natural reflex for babies and can be seen even in the womb during ultrasounds. It's a way for them to self-soothe and feel secure. This habit is generally considered normal up to the age of 2-3 years. After this age, prolonged thumb sucking can lead to dental problems, such as misalignment of teeth.", "answer_choice": "C. First 3 years of life."}
